---
title: "replace_credentials"
description: "Replace credentials in the action with actual values from the vault"
---




## Parameters

<ParamField path="action" type="BaseAction">
  The action to replace credentials in
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="attrs" type="LocatorAttributes">
  Locator attributes for validation
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="snapshot" type="BrowserSnapshot">
  Browser snapshot containing URL information
</ParamField>

## Returns

[`BaseAction`](../misc/baseaction): Modified action with replaced credentials

## Raises

- `ValueError`: If the action type is not supported or if no credentials are found
- `InvalidPlaceholderError`: If an invalid placeholder is used
